#include <bits/stdc++.h>

#define FS first

typedef pair<int, int> II;
typedef vector<int> VI;
typedef vector<II> VII;
 
const int TAM = 1e8;
long long res[TAM];
 
long long solve(int tam){
    if( tam==1)
        return 1;
    if( tam<TAM && res[tam]>=0 )
        return res[tam];
    long long aux = solve(tam/2)+solve( (tam+1)/2 )+1;
    if( tam<TAM )
        res[tam] = aux;
    return aux;
}
 
int main( ){
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
   //freopen("input.txt", "rt", stdin);
   //freopen("output.txt", "wt", stdout);
#endif
    int cas;
    long long tam;
    memset(res, -1, sizeof res);
    for( cin>>cas; cas; --cas){
        cin>>tam;
        cout<<solve(tam)<<endl;
    }
return 0;
}
